actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Armed Services, S. Rept. 93-1340.
Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A concurrent resolution relating to the awarding of the Purple Heart to members of the Armed Forces interred in the Tomb of the Unknowns at Arlington National Cemetery.

summary.text: Makes it the sense of the Congress that the Secretaries of the military departments concerned should award the Purple Heart posthumously to the members of the armed forces of the United States interred in the Tomb of the Unknowns at Arlington National Cemetery Virginia.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution relating to the awarding of the Purple Heart to members of the Armed Forces interred in the Tomb of the Unknowns at Arlington National Cemetery.
